name: 104-day_104-hosting-an-express-app-on-ubuntu-vps-using-hostinger
description: ### Step 1 - Installing Node.js & build essentials ``` curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_21.x | sudo -E bash - &&\ sudo apt-get install -y nodejs ``` Now install build essentials ``` sudo apt-get install build-essential ```
